MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL77 postcode area of Llangefni. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:54PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting additional resources to attend site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 00:53AM on 23 February 2021.
